channel.title: How do i make people amdins and mods
channel.description: i need to know where is the playerrights on a player to chnage it to mod 2

item.title: How do i make people amdins and mods
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

if youre using testscape, search for //start of moderator/admin list

look where it says

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nvi ible")) { playerRights = 3; }
and change the “nvi ible” to whatever the players name is (dont delete the quotations), and where it says playerRights = 3, change that to the number that matches what you want their player rights to be according to this:
3=owner
2=admin
1=mod

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people amdins and mods
